PERSONA:
meet john, a 35-year-old white, married man from a small town in the west south central region of the united states. he is a high school graduate and comes from a lower-income family, earning less than $30,000 annually. 

john identifies as a conservative protestant republican and considers himself a born-again or evangelical christian. although he attends religious services only a few times a year, his faith is an important part of his identity. his political views align with the republican party, and he holds conservative ideological beliefs.

despite his modest education and income, john is an active participant in the digital world, using the internet about once a day. however, he is not currently registered to vote at his current address.

john's life revolves around his family and community. he values his roots and takes pride in his non-metropolitan way of life. while he may not have many opportunities for volunteerism or civic engagement, he finds fulfillment in his personal relationships and religious beliefs.
